settings.title: Shipping, Ordering, Returns & Cancellations
settings.message:
Lontreau ships products to most countries worldwide. If you live outside of the US or Canada, shipping costs will be calculated at checkout. US and Canadian addresses are eligible for free shipping on orders over $99. 

Orders are shipped using Canada Post. Following checkout, you will receive an order confirmation email which will include a tracking number with Canada Post.

Order Cancellation

If your order has not yet been processed, we will be happy (but sad inside) to cancel your order and offer you a refund. 

Editing Shipping Addresses 

If you entered an incorrect address, please email us with the correct address before your order is shipped. If the order has already been shipped, we are unable to make changes to the shipping address.

Order Pick Up 

Yes, we will notify you via email once your order is ready for pick up. Pick ups are at Reception at 8 West Clinic, 300-1788 West Broadway, Vancouver BC V6J 2Y1

Order Processing Times  

Lontreau processes orders Monday - Friday and we strive to ship orders within 24 hours of purchase. Orders placed on Saturday and Sunday are processed on Mondays, excluding holidays. 

Returns & Refunds

If you are not satisfied with your Lontreau products, please contact our team at hello@lontreau.com to request a return authorization. Please mail product returns to: 

Lontreau Customer Service 

Attn: Returns

408-1788 West Broadway

Vancouver BC V6J 1Y1

Once we receive your returned product, we will issue a refund to the original form of payment. Products may be returned for up to 30 days after the delivery date of the package.
